betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Integrated Assembly Matrix[/quest]

[note]A better Assembly Line[/note]

All item inputs can be inserted into the same input bus.

This machine initially runs at [warn]75%[/warn] speed. This can be increased by using nanites.
Inserting §7256 Silver Nanites§f into the Nanite Containment Bus will run the machine at §c100%§f speed, while using §7§6256 Gold Nanites§f instead will run the machine at §c200%§f speed and double the amount of parallels.

The recipe tier is limited by the energy hatch tier as usual, and data sticks are still needed.

§dQuest was written by TheBigCheesish
